sys_ui_macro.name: create_prb
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="null" xmlns:g="null" xmlns:j2="jelly:core" xmlns:g2="glide">
	<g2:evaluate>
		var sd = "${sysparm_sd}" || "Problem created unauthenticated via JellyRunner - prodsec";
		var gr = new GlideRecord("problem");
		gr.initialize();
		gr.setValue("short_description",sd);
		gr.insert();
	</g2:evaluate>

</j:jelly>
